Sustainability, Environment, Water, Mr Laurie Ferguson asked the Minister Population and Communities, in writing, on 8 May 2012: Since1 January 2008, has the Minister's department Copeland Street, Liverpool, NSW, to conduct training; purpose, (b) was the duration, (c) sum was charged on the specified outcome, duration and delivery.

Speaker: Mr Burke
Title: BILLS
text: The answer to the honourable Since 1 January 2008, the Department of Sustainability, Communities has not contracted Skills Training NSW, to conduct training.
